mitar 50 rayifal pron (bima digawi wedi thabima) isawwen ohu landan olimpik ulelata sudusukam laba athi bawa anthar jathika wedi thabime sammelanaya danwa ewu bawa jathika wedi thabime krida sammelanaye sabhapathi riyar admiral shamal pranandu mahatha pawasiya.meyata amatharawa aasanna dakshathawa matha salaka kramaya anuwa pisthola isawwen da kridakayekuta ho kridikawakata shri lankawa niyojanaya kirimata awasthawa udawanu athayi da pranandu mahatha wishwasaya pala kaleya.mitar 50 rayifal pron isawwedi mangala samarakon methek dakwana lada dakshatha anthar jathika wedi thabime sammelanaya wetha yawimen anathuruwa ohu ema isawwe olimpik parisadhana mattama pasu kara athi bawa piligena atha.landan olimpik ulele siyalu wedi thabime isawwalata kridaka kridikawan 390 k sahabhagi we.

mema nawa rajaye sthawara ratak godanagime prathipaththi malawe widesgatha shramikayinge pawulwala surakshithathawaya athi kirima, wigamanika shramikayin wenuwen wishrama watup kramayak athi kirima, wigamanika shramikayinge anewasika ginumwalata 2.5%ka poliyak ekathu kirima yana yojana anthargatha wiya. 2016 warshaye athikala shramika surakum wadasatahana yatathe wigamanika shramikayinge surakshithathawaya wadath thahawuru kara athi athara ee wenuwen diwayina pura pihiti pradeshiya lekam karyalawalata anuyukthawa sanwardhana niladharin yodawa athi bawa ethumiya penwa de.
ethumiya mewani prakashayan karala madhya walin hitapu janadhipathi kiyala mewa penwana kota ewa niwaradi kirimata api aniwaryenma pelabenawa.
